description.narrative: The project development objective for APL3 is to improve Shanghai's recources and environmental sustainability in the core andsuburban areas through strategic priority investments and selective institutional reforms in the water and wastewater sectors.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :PA Annex A Section II Para 12 (b)(i) | Description :DFV's time-bound action plan | Due Date :31-Dec-2011
Finance Agreement :PA Annex B Para 8 (g)(i) | Description :Cost Recovery Ratio of DFV sub-loans | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section IV | Description :Construction of Pudong section of Bailonggang Southern Trunk Conveyor |Due Date :31-Dec-2014
Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section IV | Description :Workshop on the operation and maintenance plan of Qing Cal Sha Reservoir |Due Date :30-Jun-2010

title.narrative: Amount of wastewater intercepted and conveyed by the Bailonggang Southern Trunk Sewer (Puxi section) to the centralized treatment system
Number of participants in training, seminars, study tours and technical workshops (cumulative)
Total volume of quality water supplied by Qing Cao Sha raw water system
volume of raw water supplied through the Nanhui conveyor to receiving water treatment plant
Reduction of water pollution in Puxi area of the Upper Huangpu River (annual COD reduction)
Raw water quality transported to receiving water treatment facilities within the project area
Inclusion selected APL3 recommendations in the Shanghai Water Sector Plans
